scripts.prebuild: npm run clean-dist && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test:cover: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --root src --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require ./tools/testSetup.js "src/**/*.spec.js" --reporter progress
scripts.test:cover:travis: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --root src --report lcovonly _mocha -- --require ./tools/testSetup.js "src/**/*.spec.js" && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
